N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 180.7 - Record retention

State Regulations

All applicants must maintain records, in paper or electronic
form, of any qualified productions costs used to calculate their potential or
actual benefit(s) under this program for a minimum of three years from the date
the applicant claims the tax credit on its New York State tax return. The
department shall have the right to request such records upon reasonable
notice. Notes
